nodes.text: Klevin was a male individual who worked as a hauler in a dig-rig crew on Vernid. When one of the workers in the crew, "Devon Lhent", who was a former major in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, was confronted by two New Republic Intelligence officers who attempted to arrest him, Klevin helped to defend Lhent. Klevin offered to cover for Lhent, but the Imperial pilot chose to leave Vernid and the alias of Devon Lhent behind, returning to his fighter wing.
